channel.title: How to make a safe zone
channel.description:
okay, well i'm starting to code a new PVP server, but where i want the home, it is pking, how would i make it so the home is a safe zone? Heres a picture to make it a little more clear.
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/1zx2y69.png[/img]

item.title: How to make a safe zone
item.dc:creator: @pk2play pk2play
item.description:
@pk2play wrote:

try to comment out that inArea

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a safe zone
item.dc:creator: @pot_up_pls pot up pls
item.description:
@pot_up_pls wrote:

pk2play:

Look for something like inWild located in the player class.

This is My InWild:

[code]

public boolean inArea(int x, int y, int x1, int y1) {
	if (absX > x && absX < x1 && absY < y && absY > y1) {
		return true;
	}
	return false;
}

public boolean inWild() {
	if((absX <= 2600 && absX >= 2500 && absY <= 9950 && absY >= 9850) || 
	(absX <= 2880 && absX >= 2860 && absY <= 3560 && absY >= 3530) || 
	(absX <= 3098 && absX >= 3091 && absY <= 3499 && absY >= 3488) || 
	(absX <= 3700 && absX >= 3400 && absY <= 9800 && absY >= 9600) || 
	(absX <= 2861 && absX >= 2849 && absY <= 3555 && absY >= 3534) || 
	(absY >= 4768 && absY <= 4790) || 
	(absX <= 3590 && absX >= 3540 && absY <= 3310 && absY >= 3260) || 
	(absX <= 2930 && absX >= 2890 && absY <= 4500 && absY >= 4400) || 
	(absX <= 1950 && absX >= 1800 && absY <= 4450 && absY >= 4300) || 
	(absX <= 2600 && absX >= 2400 && absY <= 10180 && absY >= 10100) || 
	(absX <= 2600 && absX >= 2400 && absY <= 10180 && absY >= 10100) || 
	(absX <= 3000 && absX >= 2800 && absY <= 5400 && absY >= 5200) || 
	(absX <= 2690 && absX >= 2620 && absY <= 2620 && absY >= 2560) || 
	(absX <= 3400 && absX >= 3300 && absY <= 3350 && absY >= 3200) || 
	(absX <= 3000 && absX >= 2800 && absY <= 9900 && absY >= 9650) || 
	(absX <= 3229 && absX >= 3201 && absY <= 3236 && absY >= 3201) || 
	(absX <= 2695 && absX >= 2600 && absY <= 3735 && absY >= 3640) || 
	(absX <= 2675 && absX >= 2635 && absY <= 2680 && absY >= 2630) || 
	//var
	(absX <= 3190 && absX >= 3180 && absY <= 3447 && absY >= 3433) || 
	//castle
	(absX == 3230 && absY <= 3224 && absY >= 3222) || 
	(absX == 3230 && absY <= 3215 && absY >= 3213) || 
	//barrelchest
	(absX <= 1990 && absX >= 1960 && absY <= 5020 && absY >= 4980) || 
	(absX <= 2500 && absX >= 2300 && absY <= 5300 && absY >= 5000)) {	
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a safe zone
